animations module

class animations.Animation(path)

Bases: Sprite

Class for animating characters

fade(alpha)

Fades the animation

resize(width, height)

Resizes the animation

update(speed)

Updates the animation if play_animation is True

zoom(fact=1)

Zooms the animation

class animations.Still(path)

Bases: Sprite

draw(surface)

Draws the still animation

fade(alpha)

Fades the still animation

place(pos_x, pos_y, width=None, height=None, fact=None, wrt='TL')

Places the still character on the screen

resize(width, height)

Resizes the still animation

zoom(fact=1)

Zooms the still animation
